alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:10PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Malheur County through 445 PM MDT... At 409 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beulah, or 54 miles northeast of Burns, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 30 to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Westfall Butte around 420 PM MDT. Westfall and Brushy Hollow around 430 PM MDT. Buckbrush Poison Butte around 440 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
